_sText:
Important: If you get problems with wall-walking, try to do it like surfing, only by pressing D key. If you still get problems with it, turn "sv_airaccelerate 10"

Map based on Mirror's Edge, that awesome game.

Spanish ZE sever with the map: 94.46.240.22:22000
Map made for 'Los Semen-Talistas' (LST), but you can use it in your server.

Hope you like it.

Please, rate and comment, and post bugs if you find.

Video Walkthrough:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n6gwMseAz44&feature=player_embedded

Yes I know textures are a bit weird, they are custom textures made by me, and I'm not a good texture maker.
